level.heading: Exemptions.
level.text: ยง28-415.2 Exemptions. The provisions of this article shall not apply to the following: 1. Signs not exceeding 75 square feet (7 m{2}) in area, measured on one face only, nor exceeding 25 pounds (11 kg) in weight; 2. Signs supported directly on the ground; or 3. Directional signs; or 4. Temporary signs erected during the construction or alteration of a building and related to such work; or 5. The erection or placing of any signs by employees of the city, any city department or other city agency.
